title: Ep 2704 - Champaklal Scared Of The Cruise
shortDesc: Gokuldham residents enjoy themselves in Singapore. Champaklal and Jetha check in to their rooms, Champaklal freaks out about being in the cruise and wants to return to the shore. Watch the full episode to see what happens next.

title: Ep 2705 - Champaklal Finds Popatlal Dancing In A Bar
shortDesc: Jethalal and friends go drinking where a few female dancers take Popatlal to dance with them. While Bhide looks for them, Champaklal joins him. Seeing Champaklal in the bar, all the men hide.

title: Ep 2706 - A Letter From The Sponsor
shortDesc: After a lot of wandering, the Gokuldham group finally reunites on deck 8 of the cruise. From there they head to Zodiac theatre to watch a special show. Taarak reads out a letter from the unknown sponsor of their Singapore trip.

title: Ep 2707 - Meet The Sponsor
shortDesc: Babita's wish comes true when she gets to meet the captain of the cruise. After a lot of chasing, the sponsor of the trip finally shows his face. Jethalal is relieved to see that the sponsor isn't Sundar.

title: Ep 2708 - Welcome Back To Gokuldhaam
shortDesc: After a long trip to Singapore, the Gokuldhaam members have finally come back. The people who stayed back have a grand welcome waiting for the people who went. They share the experience of the trip with Iyer, Hathi and Abdul. Stay tuned!

title: Ep 2709 - Popatlal Thanks Asit
shortDesc: Popatlal happily unpacks his bag and calls Asit to thank him for sponsoring an amazing trip. Everyone else is extremely happy after reuniting with their family. Jethalal goes to Babita's house to make her see all the pictures he has clicked.

title: Ep 2710 - Reliving The Singapore Trip
shortDesc: While sliding through their pictures, Babita and Jethalal describe their Singapore trip to Iyer. Popatlal is on cloud nine and starts his day at a happy note. Everyone else cherishes their trip while talking to one another.

title: Ep 2711 - A Happy Morning For Gokuldham Society
shortDesc: Sun has risen from West today in Gokuldham society, Patrakar Popatlal is in a very happy mood because of which the morning of everyone else has also been happy. Jethalal decides to go to his shop and surprise Natu Kaka and Bagha.

title: Ep 2712 - Jethalal Gets Into Trouble
shortDesc: Nattu Kaka and Bagha create trouble for Jethalal by ordering 1000 phones without his consent. This makes Jethalal worried and he asks his friends at the soda shop for strategies to sell them.

title: Ep 2713 - Jethlal Tries Selling The Phones
shortDesc: Jethalal along with Nattu Kaka and Bagha tries selling the phones in the streets but fails. Tarak Mehta notices the problem in Jethalal's face and advises  him to have patience and keep up the good work.

title: Ep 2714 - An Order For 1000 Phones
shortDesc: Jethalal gets very happy after getting an order of 1000 phones from Sevaklal and a promise from Mr. Paresh of full payment. Later he informs the news to his friends and his father Champaklal. Even he promises for a party to his son.

title: Ep 2715 - Champaklal Worries About Elections
shortDesc:
Champaklal doubts Netaji as he bought 1000 phones and ordered for more 5000 phones. He warns Jethalal about it 
 and Jethalal discusses with his friend as well to find out a solution.

title: Ep 2716 - Jethalal Suspicious About Sevaklal
shortDesc: Jethalal discusses with Bagha and Nattu Kaka about Sevaklal and the fair means of winning the election. And they decide to inspect the matter about Sevaklal without his knowledge.

title: Ep 2717 - Bagha Fails Tracking Sevaklals Men
shortDesc: As appointed by Jethalal, Bagha tries tracking down Sevaklal's men but fails as Bawri breaks the traffic rules and get stuck with the traffic police. Later Taarak Mehta arrives at Jethalal's shop to discuss what is to be done.

title: Ep 2718 - Fight Against Corruption
shortDesc: After Sevaklal threatens Jethalal, he agrees to surrender all the cell phones to him. To take a poll, Jethalal calls for an emergency meeting in the Gokuldham society. He discusses the corruption Sevaklal has been promoting.
